title: Livestream: Building an MCP Server
description: Join us on Tuesday, June 24, at 10 am EDT / 4 pm CEST (check other timezones) for our free livestream, Live Coding: Building an MCP Server. author: Aleksandra Aganezova
excerpt: Join us on Tuesday, June 24, for our free livestream "Live Coding: Building an MCP Server".
text: The JavaScript and TypeScript IDE LivestreamsLivestream: Building an MCP Server Join us on Tuesday, June 24, at 10 am EDT / 4 pm CEST (check other timezones) for our free livestream, Live Coding: Building an MCP Server. In this livestream, we’ll team up with Max Kless, a senior engineer at Nx, to build a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server from scratch and seamlessly integrate it with JetBrains IDEs. Watch to learn how easy it is to build a tool that enhances AI model interaction within development environments, making advanced language models more accessible and useful for everyday coding tasks. Have questions? Bring them along – we’ll be answering them live. Looking forward to seeing you there! The WebStorm team Subscribe to WebStorm Blog updates Discover more
html:
The JavaScript and TypeScript IDE

Livestreams

Livestream: Building an MCP Server

Join us on Tuesday, June 24, at 10 am EDT / 4 pm CEST (check other timezones) for our free livestream, Live Coding: Building an MCP Server.

In this livestream, we’ll team up with Max Kless, a senior engineer at Nx, to build a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server from scratch and seamlessly integrate it with JetBrains IDEs. Watch to learn how easy it is to build a tool that enhances AI model interaction within development environments, making advanced language models more accessible and useful for everyday coding tasks.

Have questions? Bring them along – we’ll be answering them live. Looking forward to seeing you there!

The WebStorm team
